forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 65. South wind 5 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. South wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between 2pm and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 77. South southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. South wind 6 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
